section.section: Subject to subsection (b) of this section, each policy of health insurance shall contain the following provision:

A policy shall provide a grace period of 31 days if the policy:
allows the policyholder to choose any one of two or more modes of premium payment by remitting an amount stated in the policy for that particular mode of payment; and
does not require a formal request by the policyholder to change the mode of premium payment.
